description:
In the Consulting Fees & Pricing Guide you will learn how to set and increase your consulting fees. Whether you're a new consultant or have been a consultant for years, if you're looking to increase your income with every project this guide will show you how.

Here are just a few of the things you'll learn:

  • How to turn any consulting project into stable long-term work
  • The "plan" strategy that can add 40-50% more to your income right away
  • Steps to strategically position yourself so you can charge more
  • How to stand out in the marketplace so you become THE choice
  • The most effective fee structure to double or even triple what you're earning now per project
  • And much, much more.

The Consulting Fees & Pricing Guide includes 4 main sections:

  1. Strategic Positioning and Specialization
  2. Consulting Fee Structures and How to Choose the Right One
  3. Making Sure You Get Paid On Time and Client Issues
  4. Templates and Worksheets

I've used these same strategies that I teach you here in this course with hundreds of clients all around the world in over 23 industries.

In addition, I've taught thousands of consultants how to apply them successfully in their business so they are able to generate hundreds of thousands of dollars in project revenue per year.
title: Consulting Fees Guide: How to Increase Your Consulting Fees
